name: d3-geo-voronoi
description: Spherical Voronoi Diagram and Delaunay Triangulation

scripts.pretest: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -g d3-array:d3,d3-geo:d3,d3-delaunay:d3,d3-tricontour:d3 -f umd -n d3 --extend d3 -o dist/d3-geo-voronoi.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && terser --preamble "$(preamble)" dist/d3-geo-voronoi.js -c passes=2 -c negate_iife=false -m -o dist/d3-geo-voronoi.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j dist/d3-geo-voronoi.zip -- LICENSE README.md dist/d3-geo-voronoi.js dist/d3-geo-voronoi.min.js
